about.title: Startwood Company
about.timberText: We are a company specializing in supplying all types of natural and engineered wood. Committed to providing the finest quality, such as oak, beech, walnut, and teak wood. Regular fiberboards, moisture-resistant and fire-resistant boards, as well as plain and painted plywood in various sizes and lengths to meet customer needs and the requirements of different industries, ensuring the highest standards of quality and sustainability.
about.decorsText: Starwood Decor products are among the best wooden products available in the Saudi market. We use high-quality raw materials and the latest industrial technology, supported by a team of highly skilled engineers and technicians in the field of manufacturing. Starwood Decor offers all kinds of woodwork and decorations, such as mosque, palace, home, and office doors, wall decorations and cladding, mashrabiya, and suspended wooden ceilings. Our products are distinguished by their engineering design, ideal and professional shape to meet specific customer requirements. Customers receive the highest value in terms of quality, speed, and service excellence.

services.title: Types of Wood We Offer
services.description: We offer a wide range of woods.
services.ser1Text: A high-quality hardwood with a uniform surface, structure, and hardness, ensuring paint or finish is evenly distributed without absorption. Perfect for achieving smooth, flawless finishes.
services.ser2Text: A straight-grained, reddish-brown hardwood known for its durability and vibrant color, making it ideal for furniture, flooring, and other decorative applications.
services.ser3Text: A strong, dense hardwood with a rich, warm color and prominent grain, commonly used in furniture, flooring, and cabinetry for its durability and timeless appeal.
services.ser4Text: High-quality, durable wood panels known for their precision engineering, strength, and versatility, ideal for furniture, cabinetry, and interior design projects.
services.ser5Text: Strong and durable timber beams crafted from high-quality Austrian wood, ideal for structural applications, construction, and architectural projects requiring stability and aesthetic appeal.
services.ser6Text: Durable, water-resistant plywood coated with a smooth film layer, designed for heavy-duty applications like concrete formwork, flooring, and outdoor projects.
services.ser7Text: A specially engineered medium-density fiberboard designed to resist fire, offering enhanced safety while maintaining versatility for construction and interior projects.
services.ser8Text: A versatile and affordable engineered fiberboard product with a smooth, uniform surface, ideal for furniture, cabinetry, and interior design applications.
services.ser9Text: A standard hight-density fiberboard and anti humdity with a smooth and uniform surface, ideal for general-purpose applications such as furniture, shelving, and interior paneling.
services.ser10Text: Designed for strength, durability, and aesthetic appeal, our exterior doors are crafted to protect your space while making a lasting impression. Choose from a range of materials and styles to match your architectural vision and ensure lasting performance against the elements.
services.ser11Text: High-performance cladding solutions designed to protect and beautify your exterior walls. Available in a variety of materials and finishes, offering durability and a modern look to any architectural style.
services.ser12Text: Stylish and functional interior doors crafted for comfort and privacy. With a variety of designs, finishes, and materials to choose from, these doors seamlessly enhance the interior design of your home or workspace.
